summary.summary: Full-stack software engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Specialized in React, TypeScript, Node.js, and cloud infrastructure. Passionate about creating performant, user-friendly applications and mentoring junior developers.

description: Led development of microservices architecture serving 2M+ users, improving system reliability by 40%
Architected and implemented real-time collaboration features using WebSockets and Redis
Mentored team of 5 junior engineers, establishing code review practices and testing standards
Reduced API response time by 60% through database query optimization and caching strategies
Built and deployed React-based dashboard reducing customer support tickets by 35%
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time from hours to minutes
Developed REST APIs serving 500K+ daily requests with 99.9% uptime
Collaborated with design team to improve UX, increasing user engagement by 25%
Developed responsive websites for 15+ clients using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and WordPress
Optimized page load times by 50% through image optimization and lazy loading techniques
Maintained and updated legacy codebases, fixing critical bugs and improving performance

projects.name: DevTools Dashboard
description: Open-source developer productivity dashboard with real-time metrics and integrations
Integrates with GitHub, Jira, and Slack APIs
Featured in Dev.to's top open-source projects of 2023

projects.name: Resume Builder API
description: RESTful API for generating ATS-friendly resumes with PDF export functionality
99.8% uptime with automated monitoring and alerts
Comprehensive test coverage with Jest (95%+ coverage)
